commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
MODEL:
  BACKBONE: bert-base-uncased
  PATH: /root/autodl-tmp/models/bert-base-uncased
  
ADAPTER:
  TRAIN: None
  EVAL: None
  ENABLE: True

DATA:
  SRC_DATASET: biomedical
  BIOMEDICAL:
    SIM_METHOD: None
    DATASETS: None
  TGT_DATASET: chemdner_pse
  GRANULARITY: para

TRAIN:
  SRC_EPOCHS: 100
  TGT_EPOCHS: 80
  SRC_BATCH_SIZE: 64
  BATCH_SIZE: 16
  SRC_LR: 0.0001
  LR: 0.0001
  ORACLE: False
  TWO_STAGE: False
  SEED: 42

EVAL:
  OVERWRITE: True
  BATCH_SIZE: 128

SRC_LOSS:
  NAME: CE_MS
  LAMBDA: 1.2
  MULTI_SIMILARITY_LOSS:
    SCALE_POS: 4.0
    SCALE_NEG: 3.0
    SCALE_POS_WEIGHT: 8.0
    SCALE_NEG_WEIGHT: 6.0

TGT_LOSS:
  NAME: CE_MS
  LAMBDA: 0.1
  MULTI_SIMILARITY_LOSS:
    SCALE_POS: 2.0
    SCALE_NEG: 5.0

OUTPUT:
  ADAPTER_SAVE_DIR: adapter/para/eg
  HEAD_SAVE_DIR: head/para/eg
  RESULT_SAVE_DIR: results/para/eg
